c87b01e3-2643-4b4e-ba94-5eebc574de8b.description: Earners of this badge have engaged in a Cities of Learning creative industries workshop delivered by LOOKOUT that enabled the earner to develop knowledge of various roles & career opportunities within the creative industries and actively participated and understood the commitment and work ethic required within this industry The workshop consisted of real-life examples, practical advice and hands on experience in pursuing a career within the creative industries
c87b01e3-2643-4b4e-ba94-5eebc574de8b.name: Insights into the Creative Industries delivered by LOOKOUT

issuer.summary: issued by LOOKOUT and authorized by Future Creators

alignments.name: Cities of Learning Badge Standard - Engage Layer
alignments.description: This badge has been mapped to the Engage Layer of the Cities of Learning Badge Standard. Earners understand what's expected of them and are able to acquire information by actively experiencing learning.

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has participated in the workshop and explored less obvious career paths within the creative industries and engaged in a hands-on activity within a group setting. The earner had the opportunity to share ideas, ask questions and work within a team.
This badge is open to BHASVIC students

1aedca77-d90a-42c7-86e8-7fd1a219a85d.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their skills through successfully completing a Cities of Learning work experience placement delivered by LOOKOUT. The earner has applied their knowledge of the creative industries in a real-world environment and actively utilised their listening, self-motivation, team-working and concentration skills in a setting where they were able to receive feedback and develop, and shown consistency in approaches to time-keeping, enthusiasm, work ethic and commitment
1aedca77-d90a-42c7-86e8-7fd1a219a85d.name: Creative business work experience delivered by LOOKOUT

issuer.summary: issued by LOOKOUT and authorized by Future Creators

alignments.name: Cities of Learning Badge Standard - Demonstrate Layer
alignments.description: This badge has been mapped to the Demonstrate Layer of the Cities of Learning Badge Standard. Earners show consistency in their approach and can apply knowledge with real world context to receive feedback and develop.

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner has undertaken a period of work experience in a professional creative business in Brighton & Hove or elsewhere in the UK. They have undertaken real-world tasks and have demonstrated the ability to work well in a team, self-motivation and flexibility when working in a busy creative environment.
The course consisted of between a day and week long work experience placement in a creative business in Brighton & Hove or another location in the UK
Delivered at various employers across the city
This badge is available to current BHASVIC students
